This class serves for creation of the list of files in a given root directory. More...

Detailed Description

This class serves for creation of the list of files in a given root directory.

Definition at line 20 of file CFileList.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ifile::CFileList::CFileList ( QObject *  parent = 0)

Constructs the empty object.

To create the file list you have to use the Create() function.

Member Function Documentation

bool ifile::CFileList::Create ( const QDir &  root,
int  minRecursionDepth = 0,
int  maxRecursionDepth = 0,
const QStringList &  nameFilters = QStringList(),
QDir::SortFlags  sortSpec = QDir::Name|QDir::IgnoreCase 
)

Creates the list of files in a root directory root.

Several filters can be applied to the root before call of this function. So you can do a separate filtering of files and directories.

Parameters:
minRecursionDepthminimal recursion depth.
maxRecursionDepthmaximal recursion depth, if negative no depth is specified.
void ifile::CFileList::currentFile ( const QString &  file) [signal]

This signal is emitted whenever the file file has been processed.
